wikipedia_page.main: Major-General Algernon Clement Fuller CBE (30 March 1885 – 6 August 1970) was a senior British Army officer during the Second World War, and inventor of the Fullerphone.

link_mentions.page: List of people educated at Bedford School
response: *Major General Algernon Fuller CBE (1885–1970), War Office, 1938–1940, Ministry of Supply, 1940–1941, and inventor of the Fullerphone
